title: Create Comprehensive Knowledge Graph for Halict Project
description: Create a structured knowledge graph for the Halict project that accurately represents all components, pages, features, and their relationships. This will serve as documentation and reference for the project architecture.

title: Create Core Project and Component Entities
description: Create the main project entity and core component entities that form the foundation of the Halict project structure.

title: Create Page Entities
description: Create entities for all the pages in the Halict project, including HomePage, AboutPage, GamesPage, ThreeDVisualizationsPage, and FinancialToolsPage.

title: Create Layout Component Entities
description: Create entities for the layout components in the Halict project, including ClientLayoutWrapper, ClientLayout, Navbar, and Footer.

title: Create Theme Component Entities
description: Create entities for the theme-related components in the Halict project, including ThemeProvider, ThemeToggle, and ColorSchemeSelector.

title: Create Game Component Entities
description: Create entities for the game components in the Halict project, including ChessGame, TicTacToe, and Sudoku.

title: Create Visualization Component and Style Entities
description: Create entities for the visualization component (BugisMapViewer) and style files (theme-variables.css and globals.css) in the Halict project.

title: Create Entity Relationships
description: Create relationships between all entities in the Halict project knowledge graph to establish the project structure and component interactions.
